data.name: I.D.F.K.
data.detailed_description:
I.D.F.K. is a open-world survival game with only two rules: stay alive, no matter how you must do it. And dominate economically. But don't forget, you're not alone...

Key Features

  • With no save points, when you die, expect to have to start over again.
  • Complex survival mechanics, including hunting, crafting, building, health, economy, and resource management.
  • Unpredictable interactions with other players leading to limitless play emergent gameplay.
  • A Massive map with a variety of different landscapes and landmarks
  • Up to 100 players striving to survive by any means necessary. Make ally's, kill on sight, or kidnap strangers and bend them to your desire, or be betrayed. Anything and Everything is possible.
  • An array of environmental threats can make survival more difficult than you may expect.

data.short_description: How long can you survive, and how much money can you make? A land overrun with wildlife and bandits, where you compete against others to survive and gather the resources and money necessary to control the land and build cities. Will you team up with strangers? Or play alone? IDFK - It's your story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.5GHz or Better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or better
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
